pullRequest.title: Migrate some more mapper test cases
pullRequest.bodyText:
Migrate some more mapper test cases from ESSingleNodeTestCase to
MapperTestCase.

commit.message:
Migrate some more mapper test cases

Migrate some more mapper test cases from `ESSingleNodeTestCase` to
`MapperTestCase`.

nodes.bodyText: A useful byproduct of this exercise is finding all the mappers that we've forgotten to implement meta on!

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -17,7 +17,6 @@
  * under the License.
  */
 apply plugin: 'elasticsearch.yaml-rest-test'
-apply plugin: 'elasticsearch.internal-cluster-test'

nodes.bodyText: This is a pain, and the really annoying thing is that it's hard to fix these inconsistencies because of BWC.  I need to think some more about it.
